I am sorry for my sudden and unexplained absence. This has probably
been one of the more busy and stressful two weeks I have had in some
time. I had almost no time to even look at a computer this whole
weekend never mind formulate posts.

I hope to have posts out later on today or tomorrow at the latest. I
appreciate your patience in this regard.

Thanks
- Preston
